For now, you’ll need to edit this card on our website.
Check your address details and try again.
Error saving your new billing address.
Please enter the one-time code that was sent to your device.

The code will enter automatically.
Or enter it manually if you already have it.
We keep your financial details secure so no one sees your sensitive info.

Link your favorite banks, debit, and credit cards so you can pay, get paid, and send money to friends while you\'re on the go.\n\nWe keep your financial details secure so no one sees your sensitive information.
Please check your card info and try again.
Link your bank on our website.
We\'re adding features as fast as we can. For now, you can link your bank on our website.
Almost done! Just enter your card security code.
Thanks! Now enter your expiration date.
Choose how to link your cards
Quickly link the cards issued by your bank
Link all your cards from %1$s to PayPal
Link all your cards to PayPal at once.
Use %1$s points toward eligible purchases for a statement credit.
By tapping "Agree and Continue," you agree to let PayPal access your information from %1$s.
Use Chase Pay for additional benefits
Manage your Chase Pay settings and log in again here to see your changes.
Choose the amount of %s you\'d like to use for eligible purchases when you check out with PayPal.
The balance will be charged to your %s card.
By linking your %s, you agree to:
\u2022     PayPal\'s terms & conditions for using your rewards
Congrats! You\'re ready to use your %s
The next time you use your %1$s card to check out with PayPal, you can use your available %2$s for eligible purchases.
How much do you want to transfer?
PayPal works with or without a balance
When you have a balance, use it automatically when you pay. When you don\'t, pay securely using your preferred bank or card.
Add Money to your balance for free by using direct deposit, transferring from your bank, or depositing cash in stores.
Leave the money in your balance and use it automatically when you send money or buy something. Or transfer it to your bank account.
Use your PayPal balance to pay online and with the PayPal Cash Card. You can also create a goal and set money aside.
Use your PayPal balance to shop online, pay with the PayPal Cash Card, get cash at ATMs, and send money to family and friends.
Add money to your negative balance
We don\'t charge penalty fees for this, but you won\'t be able to send money or make purchases until you add money.
You added %s to your PayPal balance

string.note: Example: You transferred $120.28 to Citibank Checking (2345)

resources.string: This will be converted to about %1$s
Transfers can take up to 5 days.
This rate includes our conversion fee.
This rate includes our conversion fee.
To add money to your balance, you\'ll need to link your bank to your PayPal account.
To transfer your balance to a bank, you\'ll need to link one to your PayPal account.
You’ll need to confirm your bank account before you can transfer money from it.
Transfers made after 7:00 PM ET or on weekends or holidays take longer. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
You transferred money to your bank using your %1$s %2$s ••••%3$s.
All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Try an Instant Transfer to your bank

You\'ll typically see the money in your bank account within minutes when you use your eligible debit card. There\'s a $0.25 fee. Or, you can use the free, standard option. Transfers may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank.
Amount is less than the required %1$s minimum.
The money remains in your PayPal balance
Right now, we\'re not able to complete this transaction. Please try again later.
For security reasons we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %s hours, but we\'ll email you as soon as we have an update.
For security reasons we need a bit more time to review this transaction. We\'ll email you as soon as we have an update.
Regulations require us to take a closer look at some transactions. Your payment is temporarily pending while we review it.
\n\nBecause your transfer is delayed, you won\'t be charged the %s fee.
\n\nBecause your transfer is delayed, you won\'t be charged any fee.
Don\'t see all of your banks and cards?
Certain banks and card issuers don\'t allow transfers.
Transfers may take up to 30 minute and vary by bank. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Transfers may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Fee:%1$s%% (%2$s maximum)\n\nTransfers may take up to 30 minutes and vary by bank. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Transfers made after 7:00 PM ET or on weekends or holidays take longer. All transfers are subject to review and could be delayed or stopped if we identify an issue.
Your %1$s\n%2$s ••••%3$s is linked but isn\'t eligible for Instant Transfers.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to 5 days. You won’t be charged the $0.25 fee. Would you still like to continue with your transfer?
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %1$s hours. You won’t be charged the %2$s fee. Would you still like to continue with your transfer?
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. This can take up to %s hours. Would you still like to continue with your transfer?
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. We\'ll email you as soon as we have an update. You won\'t be charged the %s fee. Or, you can cancel your transfer.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. We\'ll email you as soon as we have an update. You won\'t be charged the %s fee.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. We\'ll email you as soon as we have an update. Or, you can cancel your transfer.
For security reasons, we need a bit more time to review this transaction. We\'ll email you as soon as we have an update.
What do you want to do with your money?
Move your money to your debit card in minutes or to your bank in about a day.
Send or spend securely from your balance. Use it as fun money or save for a rainy day.
To keep your money in PayPal, we need a bit more info
Confirming customer identities is one of the best ways we keep your account secure. You\'ll only do this once.
We\'ll send an email as soon as we\'re done reviewing your docs. This usually takes 2–3 business days.
We\'re still reviewing your info. We\'ll send you an email as soon as we\'re done.
Your money is now available in your PayPal balance. Send it, spend it, or just keep it as your stash of fun money.
For now, you can transfer your money to your bank account.
It looks like something went wrong on our end.
Until you confirm your info, you won\'t be able to send or spend money in your PayPal account.
While you\'re waiting, you can always transfer the money to your bank.
Create a PayPal balance with a quick, one-time confirmation
Then you can easily send, spend, or save your unclaimed money and any other money you may receive.
Confirm your info now so you can send or spend the money in your PayPal account. If not, you can always transfer the money to your bank account from your Summary.
If you want to send money right now, try using a linked bank or card.
We\'ll send an email as soon as we\'re done reviewing your info. This usually takes 2-3 business days.
Bring your cash to a participating store and show the cashier your barcode. The money will be added to your PayPal balance in just 15 minutes.
Looks like something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a minute or two.
Regulations require us to take a closer look at some transactions. Your payment is temporarily pending while we review it.
If you\'ve made any payments that haven\'t completed yet, we\'ll charge those to your card even after you remove it.
Looks like something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a minute or two.
When it\'s time to pay, you\'ve got options. Check out your preferences below.
When it\'s time to pay or get paid, you\'ve got options. Check out your preferences below.
Sending money to friends and family will default to your balance or bank to save you a fee.
When sending to friends and family, we\'ll use your bank if we can save you a fee.
Pick a new preferred way to pay
We\'ll use this when you shop online or send money for goods and services. \n%s
It looks like there\'s an issue with your payment method. It might be unconfirmed or expired. Find out more in the Banks and Cards section.
This is your preferred way to pay. If you have any outstanding purchases, those will complete even if this is removed.
We keep your financial details secure so no one sees your sensitive information. %1$s
If you don\'t have enough money in your balance, we\'ll ask you to pick one of your other payment methods.
Every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it right to your bank account.
It’s the 9-digit number at the lower left corner of your checks. No checks? Log into your online banking and you can find it there.
How to find a routing number
It’s the 3-17 digit number on your checks or bank statements. Or log into your online banking and you can find it there, too.
How to find an account number

By tapping \"Agree,\" you agree to let PayPal send 2 small deposits and retrieve them in 1 withdrawal.

This %1$s bank account may be used as your default payment method. To learn how to change your preferences, view PayPal policies and your payment method rights.
Now you can transfer money from your PayPal balance to this bank. Confirm it and use your bank to pay or send money.
Now you can transfer money from your PayPal balance to this bank.
Looks like something went wrong on our end. Please try again in a minute or two.
Check back in a couple of days.
Check your online banking in a few days for 2 small deposits, then come back to the app and enter them.
Enter the amounts of the 2 deposits we made to your %1$s(%2$s) account
If you need help, contact us. Or you can link and confirm a different bank.
You can link a bank account that\'s registered in one of the following countries:
Select the country of your bank account.
Please enter your date of birth
You must be at least 18 years old.
By tapping Link This Bank, you consent to an identity and credit check.
We need your International Bank Account Number (IBAN) to better identify and process payments. You can find your IBAN on your bank statement or online banking, or by contacting your bank.

Thanks for providing your %1$s details. You can now transfer money from PayPal to your bank account.\n\nPlease accept the direct debit mandate below if you’d also like us to automatically pull payments from your bank when you make PayPal purchases.

By tapping Accept you agree to the SEPA direct debit mandate and authorize PayPal to send instructions to your bank account. You also authorize your bank to debit your account in accordance with the instructions from PayPal. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks, starting from the date on which your account was debited.
To be able to buy online or send money, you must accept the Direct Debit Mandate.
Check your bank in a few days for the confirmation code we\'ve sent, then come back and enter the code.
Enter below the code we sent you, so we can confirm your bank account has been properly set up with PayPal.

We sent a confirmation code to your bank. Log into your online banking or call your bank to get the code. To make sure you get it, we\'ll send the code each time you make a transaction until you confirm your bank.

Payments will appear as PAYPAL on your bank statement. A copy of your Direct Debit Instruction will be emailed to you.

If your bank account requires more than one person\'s signature to authorise a Direct Debit Instruction, please select Finish Later and go to paypal.com to print the instructions and post us a signed copy.
Your bank transit is a 5 digit number located on your bank statement.
Please enter your bank transit number
Institution is a 3 digit number located on your bank statement.

By tapping \"Agree,\" you agree to let PayPal send 2 small deposits and retrieve them in 1 withdrawal.

This bank account may be used as your default payment method. To learn how to change your preferences, view PayPal policies and your payment method rights.
Link a new bank or card
The code will now be submitted automatically.
Unable to fetch the code automatically\nyou can enter it manually.
If there\'s an issue with your preferred payment method, we\'ll try the remaining payment methods linked to your PayPal account. View PayPal policies.
Make sure your PIN is hard to guess.
The PIN you entered did not match.
Avoid using easy to guess PINs like 1234 or 5555.
To manage Chase Pay, look for the link on the card details screen.
Don\'t see all of your cards?
You can always link one manually.
Here\'s your card information provided by %s. Now, choose which cards to link to your PayPal account.
By tapping \"Next,\" you agree to Paypal\'s terms and conditions for linking your card

We will share your account information with %1$s in order to facilitate the services you request, keep your account updated, and help manage risk and fraud.\n\nBy tapping \"Agree and Link,\" you agree to Paypal\'s terms and conditions for linking your card
We\'ll share your information with %1$s to facilitate the services you request, display available card features, and keep your account updated.
Are you sure you don\'t want to link any cards?
Check the security code and try again.
Are you sure you want to exit? Not all of your cards have been linked.
We\'re sorry, things don\'t appear to be working right now.
You can always link a card manually instead.
The next time you check out with PayPal, you can use your available %1$s for eligible purchases.
The next time you check out with PayPal, you can use your available %1$s for a statement credit.
You’ll no longer be able to use your %1$s for eligible purchases. Pending payments with %2$s will still be processed even after you decide to stop using your %3$s with PayPal.
These card(s) could not be linked
We\'re sorry, things don\'t appear to be working right now.\nTry again later.
You can always link a card manually instead.
Use your %1$s %2$s for a statement credit on eligible purchases when you shop online.
Never worry about an expired card or outdated info. Your cards will stay updated automatically.
We can\'t remove your %1$s right now. Try again later.
Don’t want to remove %1$s entirely? You can hide a card anytime by updating your %3$s settings.
When you remove %1$s, you’ll no longer see any of the cards you linked with %2$s. You can always manually link these cards instead.
We’re not able to remove %1$s right now. Try again later.
Every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it right to your bank account.
Turn it on, and every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer it right to your bank account.
Looks like you chose a bank or debit card that\'s been removed. Choose another bank or card.
Looks like your debit card has expired. Choose another bank or debit card.
For your security, we turned off automatic transfers. Choose another debit card or bank to turn it back on.
Now, every time you receive money, we\'ll transfer all of it to your %1$s. You can always turn this off in your Profile.
There\'s an issue with your bank or debit card
Choose a different bank or debit card to turn on automatic transfers.
We had to turn off automatic transfers for the moment. You can still transfer money to your bank.
Make your transfers automatic. No need to log in. Go to your Profile to turn this on.
Right now, we\'re not able to set up automatic transfers for you. You can try again the next time you transfer money to your bank. Or try turning them on in your Profile.
Looks like something went wrong on our end.
Choose a different Bank or Card
You transferred %1$s to your bank using your %2$s.
To help keep your account secure, we\'ll take a closer look at this transfer. The review could take up to %1$s hours.
You can help speed up the review process by confirming your identity.
We\'ll review your photo and ID. If we\'re able to confirm your identity, we may release your funds sooner.
You\'ll get a notification with an update in the next 5 minutes.
Looks like we had some trouble getting a good photo of you. Don\'t worry. We\'ll manually review your %1$s transfer, and your funds will be released within %2$s hours.
It looks like you share this card with someone else. We\'ll text that person before adding the card to your account.
PayPal: %1$s wants to link your %2$s ••%3$s to PayPal. For security, we won\'t do anything until you respond. Text YES to approve, NO to decline.
You\'ll see a notification in PayPal once the other account holder responds, and we\'ll show the card in your account if it\'s approved.
We\'re sorry, things don\'t appear to be working right now.
